articles.headline: Regtech Awards Finalist for Export of the Year
articles.summary: LAB Group named finalist in the RegTech Awards for Export of the Year (Australian Founded), recognizing its international growth and leadership in innovative onboarding solutions for global financial services.

articles.headline: Recognised by Fintech Australia for outstanding contributions
articles.summary: LAB Group recognized by Fintech Australia for its contributions to the fintech sector, emphasizing advancements in digital onboarding and compliance solutions.

articles.headline: KordaMentha and LAB Group forge strategic partnership to deliver turnkey AML/CTF managed services
articles.summary: KordaMentha, an independent Australian advisory firm, has entered into a strategic partnership with LAB Group to deliver joint AML/CTF managed services, combining LAB's RegTech platform with KordaMentha's operational expertise. This responds to demand from Australia's evolving financial services regulations and Tranche 2 AML/CTF reforms.

articles.headline: KordaMentha and LAB Group forge strategic partnership to deliver turnkey AML/CTF managed services
articles.summary: KordaMentha partners with LAB Group, a Melbourne-based RegTech leader, to offer comprehensive managed services for customer onboarding, verification, due diligence, and reporting. LAB CEO Nick Boudrie highlights the solution's scalability for businesses amid changing AML requirements.

potential_actions: Invite the founders to play golf at a prestigious local course, followed by lunch at the clubhouse to discuss their recent achievements in the Regtech Awards.
Suggest a coffee meeting at a nearby café known for local specialties, where you can congratulate them on their recognition by Fintech Australia and discuss their vision for the future.
Attend the upcoming industry conference where LAB Group is being recognized and arrange a dinner afterward at a top-rated restaurant to celebrate their accomplishments with the executive team.
Send a personalized gift basket featuring high-quality teas and coffees from Australia, with a handwritten note expressing admiration for their strategic partnership with KordaMentha.
Introduce the LAB founders to key figures in your network who specialize in AML/CTF services, offering to facilitate a lunch meeting where they can explore synergies.

Personally visit LAB Group's office to present a bespoke trophy commemorating their achievements in innovation and engagement, creating an opportunity for an in-depth conversation about future collaborations.
